file_content.text: [This droid is damaged beyond repair, but with some work, you manage to access its memory core. The droid's last orders read:]
It's done, B3-RD. The new turret targeting program. Any Imperial bombers near our residential zones are in for a surprise!
Now, I need you to upload the targeting program directly into the turret placement down the street; it'll propagate from there.
Be careful, B3. The military's talking about snipers in that area. Upload the targeting program and come right back, understand?
[You download the targeting program. Uploading it to the turret should make Corellia's skies much safer.]
[Someone shot this droid clean through its power unit, leaving it beyond repair.]
